review: Worked great once I figured out how to put it on the TV.
author: Jackie Dorsey "moondors"

review: I can't get jw/tv/broadcasting on this like I can on Roku.
author: Kathy Rabel

review: I have 50 mbs internet speed connection. But YouTube is very slow in Amazon stick.
author: muthu

review: Just amazing, super easy to install and even easier to use.  Good bye Redbox, Netflix and video stores.  We love, especially the ability to stop watching a movie and then resume it the next time.Best TV option out there...
author: Curtis Schwinck

review: Stick is fine but advertising false. All those movies! Have to pay for most of them. What is on prime is hardly more than I get from Netflix or On Demand. Why did I bother?
author: Helen Searing

review: Great product, priced a lot better than apple tv
author: lori wardin
